item.title: Embedding Asciinema in Hugo Websites
item.description: Following a general approach for any theme, steps to be performed (following this article): Specific for the theme Stack: Click Here Get code for asciinema player wget https://github.com/asciinema/asciinema-player/releases/download/v2.6.1/asciinema-player.css wget https://github.com/asciinema/asciinema-player/releases/download/v2.6.1/asciinema-player.js Place them in static/css and static/js, where static is folder in the root dir of the website Copy the layouts/partials/_shared/head.html or layouts/partials/head/head.html from themes/<theme-name> directory to your website’s root directory with the same folder structure Do the same with layouts/_default/baseof.
